alert.note: Alert for Delaware; Otsego; Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 22 at 8:00PM EST until December 24 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM FRIDAY TO NOON EST SATURDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 24 below zero. Winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Otsego, Delaware and Sullivan counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM Friday to noon EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. Tree limbs could be blown down and scattered power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong cold front will cross the region on Friday. A lull in the winds may occur Friday morning, but winds will pick up again after frontal passage and shift to the southwest.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
